DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomise , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel group study assess safety efficacy orally administer DS102 capsule versus placebo treatment adult patient Non Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease ( NAFLD )
DOC.brief_title: Safety And Efficacy Study Of Orally Administered DS102 In Patients With NAFLD
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose NAFLD presence hepatic steatosis image histology absence secondary cause Patients ALT ≥ 1.5 ULN < 5 ULN two occasion 7 day apart screen Patients body mass index ( BMI ) 25.0 40.0 kg/m² inclusive . Patients history control obesity control diabetes allow study Patients age 18 75 year inclusive Patients unstable metabolic condition weight change > 5 % 3 month prior inclusion Patients medical/surgical history gastric bypass surgery , orthotopic liver transplant ( OLT ) list OLT Patients uncontrolled diabetes mellitus type 2 , i.e . HbA1c ≥ 9 % ( 75 mmol/mol ) time screen
